description: leveldb: update .hgignore to look more like $GOROOT/.hgignore.

messages.text:
Hello bradfitz@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/leveldb-go
LGTM but I'd almost prefer there was no .hgignore at all. It's caused me more trouble than it's relieved.

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/leveldb-go/source/detail?r=4075582fd609 ***

leveldb: update .hgignore to look more like $GOROOT/.hgignore.

R=bradfitz, r
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/6053043
